verses.verse: "Do you think <S%H2803><s%> this to be your right, <S%H4941><s%> or do you say, <S%H559><s%> <S%H6664><s%> 'My righteousness is more than God <S%H410><s%>'s,'
That you ask, <S%H559><s%> <S%H5532><s%> 'What advantage will it be to you? <S%H3276><s%> What profit shall I have, <S%H2403><s%> more than if I had sinned?'
I will answer <S%H7725><s%> you, <S%H7453><s%> and your companions with you.
Look <S%H5027><s%> to the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> and see. <S%H7200><s%> See <S%H7789><s%> the skies, <S%H7834><s%> which are higher than you. <S%H1361><s%>
If you have sinned, <S%H2398><s%> what effect do <S%H6466><s%> you have against him? <S%H6588><s%> If your transgressions are multiplied, <S%H7231><s%> what do you do to him? <S%H6213><s%>
If you are righteous, <S%H6663><s%> what do you give <S%H5414><s%> him? <S%H3947><s%> Or what does he receive from your hand? <S%H3027><s%>
Your wickedness <S%H7562><s%> may hurt a man <S%H376><s%> as you are, <S%H6666><s%> and your righteousness may profit a son <S%H1121><s%> of man. <S%H120><s%>
"By reason of the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of oppressions <S%H6217><s%> they cry out. <S%H7768><s%> They cry <S%H2199><s%> for help by reason of the arm <S%H2220><s%> of the mighty. <S%H7227><s%>
But none says, <S%H559><s%> <S%H433><s%> 'Where is God my Maker, <S%H6213><s%> who gives <S%H5414><s%> songs <S%H2158><s%> in the night, <S%H3915><s%>
who teaches <S%H502><s%> us more than the animals <S%H929><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> and makes us wiser <S%H2449><s%> than the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the sky? <S%H8064><s%>'
There they cry, <S%H6817><s%> but none gives answer, <S%H6030><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the pride <S%H1347><s%> of evil men. <S%H7451><s%>
Surely God <S%H410><s%> will not hear <S%H8085><s%> an empty <S%H7723><s%> cry, <S%H7706><s%> neither will the Almighty regard it. <S%H7789><s%>
How <S%H637><s%> much less when you say <S%H559><s%> you don't <S%H7789><s%> see him. <S%H1779><s%> The cause is before <S%H6440><s%> him, <S%H2342><s%> and you wait for him!
But now, <S%H6485><s%> because he has not visited in his anger, <S%H639><s%> neither does he greatly <S%H3966><s%> regard <S%H3045><s%> arrogance. <S%H6580><s%>

Therefore Job <S%H347><s%> opens <S%H6475><s%> his mouth <S%H6310><s%> with empty <S%H1892><s%> talk, <S%H3527><s%> and he multiplies words <S%H4405><s%> without <S%H1097><s%> knowledge. <S%H1847><s%>"
